00045 // DataPlastNeuron definition
00046 // for neuron with plastic synapses
00047 // contains a pointer list to the presynapses, and a method for the plasticity update
00049 
00050 class DataPlastNeuron
00051         : public DataRecordNeuron
00052 {
00053     friend class PlasticityManager;
00054     friend class PlastThread;
00055     friend class IFMech; //
00056     friend class InstantIFMech; //
00057     template <class PoissonParameter, class ActivationFunction> friend class PoissonMech; //
00058     template <class CorrInputMechConfigType> friend class CorrInputMech;
00059 
00060 // construction
00061 protected:
00062     explicit DataPlastNeuron(ConfigBase * const configurator);
00063     void add_presynapse_impl(SynapseInterface * const syn);
00064 
00065 // update methods
00066 protected:
00067     void notify_firing_impl(const Time & time_to_spike);
00068     void plasticity_update();
00069 
00070 // members and accessors
00071 protected:
00072     typedef std::list<SynapseInterface *> ListPreSynType;
00073     const ListPreSynType & list_presynapses_impl() const {
00074         return list_presynapses_;
00075     }
00076 private:
00077     ListPreSynType list_presynapses_;
00078     bool has_fired_;
00079 };
00080 
00081 
00082 
00084 // PlasticityManager class definition
00085 // to centralise all plastic neurons and launch the general plasticity update
00087 
00088 class PlasticityManager
00089 {
00090     friend class DataPlastNeuron;
00091     friend class PlastThread;
00092 public:
00093     static void append(DataPlastNeuron * const pt_nrn);
00094     static void plast_update_general();
00095 private:
00096     typedef std::list<DataPlastNeuron *> ListPlastNrnType;
00097     static ListPlastNrnType list_;
00098 };
00099 
00100 
00101 
00103 // inline definitions
00105 
00107 // call the plasticity update for all the neurons with the DataPlastNeuron class
00108 //   (supposedly all the pneurons with plastic synapses)
00109 inline void PlasticityManager::plast_update_general()
00110 {
00111     for (ListPlastNrnType::const_iterator i = list_.begin();
00112             i != list_.end();
00113             ++ i)
00114         (*i)->plasticity_update();
00115 }
00116

00131 // config constructor
00132 inline DataPlastNeuron::DataPlastNeuron(ConfigBase * const configurator)
00133         : DataRecordNeuron(configurator), has_fired_(false)
00134 {
00135     if (! dynamic_cast<DataPlastNeuronConfig *>(configurator))
00136         throw ConfigError("DataPlastNeuron: void configurator");
00137     PlasticityManager::append(this);
00138 }
00139 
00141 // called when adding a presynapse to update the information
00142 inline void DataPlastNeuron::add_presynapse_impl(SynapseInterface * const syn)
00143 {
00144     // add the synapse to the list of presynapses
00145     list_presynapses_.push_back(syn);
00146     // add the synaptic mechanism
00147     DataRecordNeuron::add_presynapse_impl(syn);
00148 }
00149 
00151 // called when the neuron fires a spike (activation mechanism)
00152 inline void DataPlastNeuron::notify_firing_impl(const Time & time_to_spike)
00153 {
00154     has_fired_ = true;
00155     // add the spike time to the list of spike times
00156     DataRecordNeuron::notify_firing_impl(time_to_spike);
00157 }
00158 
00160 // called by the neuron after a spike to do the plasticity update on pre- and post-synapses (plasticity mechanism)
00161 inline void DataPlastNeuron::plasticity_update()
00162 {
00163     // called only when this neuron fired a spike during the timestep
00164     if (has_fired_) {
00165         // update all synapses
00166         for (ListPreSynType::const_iterator i = list_presynapses_impl().begin();
00167                 i != list_presynapses_impl().end();
00168                 ++i)
00169             (*i)->on_postneuron_fire_plast_update(spike_time_list_impl().back());
00170         for (ListPostSynType::const_iterator i = list_postsynapses_impl().begin();
00171                 i != list_postsynapses_impl().end();
00172                 ++i)
00173             (*i)->on_preneuron_fire_plast_update(spike_time_list_impl().back());
00174         has_fired_ = false;
00175     }
00176 }
00177
